home.title: Share Your User Journey Map üó∫Ô∏è
home.description: This is a tool to help record and analyze user experiences through six key stages to track users' emotional changes and experiences.

goals.title: Through this tool, we hope to:
items: Help users organize and understand their experience journey
Provide real case references for product design and service improvement
Analyze user behavior patterns and emotional changes

howToStart.title: How to Start

1.title: Recall and Organize Experience
1.description: Think about the user experience you want to share, whether it's product usage, service experience, or life experience.

2.title: Chat with ChatGPT
2.description: Use the suggested GPT Prompt to have a natural conversation with ChatGPT, helping to clarify your thoughts and structure your story.

3.title: Copy and Summarize
3.description: Copy the structured content generated by ChatGPT into the form, and adjust according to the six key stages.

4.title: Submit Journey Map
4.description: After confirming the form content is complete, click 'Submit Journey Map' to add your experience to our database.

5.title: Download and Share
5.description: Download the generated CSV file or share this experience with friends to help more people understand user experience.

howToStart.footer: Thank you to all contributors sharing their user experiences! Your sharing not only helps other users but also provides valuable reference for product improvement.

search.placeholder: Search by user type, context, or goal...

projectGoal.title: Project Goal
projectGoal.description: This project aims to help users document and share their experiences, providing valuable insights for product improvement and user experience research.

openData.title: Open Data:
openData.description: All shared experiences are open data, helping more people understand user behavior patterns.

community.title: Community Driven:
community.description: Currently {{count}} journey maps have been shared, each contributing to our collective understanding.

empathy.title: Empathy First:
empathy.description: Through sharing experiences, we help others avoid similar challenges and improve product design.

callToAction.text: Want to contribute? Visit us on

developer.title: About the Developer
developer.description: This is an open source project. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or suggestions:

usageInstructions.title: Instructions: How to Record Your Journey Map

1.title: 1. Have a Conversation
items: First, have a natural conversation with ChatGPT (or other LLMs) to describe the user experience you want to share.
During the conversation, try to recall each key step and understand what information can be filled into the journey map.

2.title: 2. Summarize the Conversation
2.description: When you feel you've described enough, use the following prompt template to structure your conversation:

3.title: 3. Fill in the Form
items: Use the output from GPT to fill in the form step by step.
Ensure each field is complete and clear for future analysis or use.

content.intro: I want to record a user journey map. Please help me generate the corresponding form content based on the following questions:

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.userType: 2. User Type (e.g., New User, Experienced User):
basicInfo.context: 3. Context Description (e.g., First Time Using Product, Encountering Issues):
basicInfo.goal: 4. User Goal (e.g., Complete Specific Task, Solve Problem):

fields.painPoint: 4. Pain Points or Opportunities (Challenges or Areas for Improvement):

content.footer: Please summarize my answers and generate a complete form content that I can directly fill into the system.
